items.summary: Publish the currently deployed Draft Version 33 to live/production by executing the production deployment checklist (build + deploy backend and frontend to the IC network) and recording the results.

Complete and expand the domain walkthrough documentation so it fully walks a user through low-cost domain options and connecting a purchased domain to the deployed frontend canister (DNS + IC custom domain mapping), including concrete DNS record examples and where to find the frontend canister ID.

Complete the production go-live runbook so it is actionable end-to-end (it currently stops at “Environment Check”), including environment validation steps, the exact deploy commands to run, and post-deploy verification steps (ic0.app URL and `https://clearing.icp0.io`).
